text.data-name:
4. Vendor Delivery In some cases, you, the vendors may deliver the food to customers. If we want this, we will contact to you and you can cancel it if you wish.
5. Payment You can get the payment for an Order on cash, or can choose to have the payment us

tspan.tspan: In some cases, you, the vendors may deliver the food to
customers. If we want this, we will contact to you and you can
cancel it if you wish.
You can get the payment for an Order on cash, or can choose to
have the payment using any of the different payment methods
offered by us. Tasty Food reserves the right to offer additional
payment methods and/or remove existing payment methods at
anytime in its sole discretion.
You, the Vendors are responsible for the preparation, condition
and quality of Goods. In cases of Vendor Delivery, you are
responsible for delivery of the Goods and/or Orders. Tasty Food
shall not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your
contractual relationship with the Customer.
Tasty Food does not assume any liability for the quantity,
quality, condition or other representations of the Goods and/or
services provided by Vendors or guarantee the accuracy or
completeness of the information (including menu information,
photos and images of the Goods) displayed on the Vendor’s
listing/offering on the Platform. Nothing in these Terms shall
exclude Vendor’s liability for death or personal injury arising
from Vendor’s gross negligence or willful misconduct.
